faq.question: How do I find out about upcoming outings and day trips?
faq.answer: Visit our website, www.olliatauburn.org to view the OLLI Bulletin Board, our weekly newsletter that includes information about travel opportunities.

faq.question: Where do I go to sign up for a social?
faq.answer: Simply email us at olli@auburn.edu or call our office at 334‐844‐5100, 334‐844‐3102, or 334‐844‐3105. Specific details about our upcoming social events are posted on our website, www.olliatauburn.org. Please register by the deadline in order to guarantee your reservation for the event.

faq.question: Who do I contact about auditing a course at Auburn University?
faq.answer: Visit our website for details concerning the auditing process, http://www.olliatauburn.org/documents/university_privileges.pdf

faq.question: How do I get an Auburn University library card?
faq.answer: Visit our website for details about how to obtain a library card, http://www.olliatauburn.org/documents/university_privileges.pdf

faq.question: What are the Alumni Courses and how can I get involved?
faq.answer: To learn more about auditing opportunities for members of the AU Alumni Association, email Linda Shook, OLLI Director, at olli@auburn.edu.

faq.question: When is the information mailed out to current members about the upcoming semester?￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼
faq.answer: Information is mailed upon request via the postal service at least three weeks prior to the start of the term.

faq.question: How do I get added to the mailing list?
faq.answer: To add your name to the OLLI mailing list, email us at olli@auburn.edu or call us at 334‐ 844‐5100, 334‐844‐3102, or 334‐844‐3105.
